text: @realDonaldTrump @VP In the search for common ground, can all Americans at least agree that the internal capital "V" in Trump's weird styling of "CoronaVirus" is stupid? You aren't branding a start-up here, Mr. President. Trumpies: do you like this? If so, why? #coranavirus #CamelCase
